author: CBC News
title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world on Thursday
description: Travellers returning to Canada from abroad are facing a new order requiring them to self-isolate, the latest measure from a government trying to deal with both a rise in COVID-19 cases and growing economic fallout. Here's what's happening in Canada and around…
content:
